New Records: Isaiah Joe scored a career-high 31 points on 11-of-16 shooting and 8-of-11 from 3. The eight outside makes were also a career-high.
Key Match Events: Isaiah Joe snapped out of a slump and scored a career-high 31 points.
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the New York Knicks 126-101 at Madison Square Garden.
The Thunder have won seven games in a row at MSG since 2017.
Post-Match Reflections: Mark Daigneault expressed happiness for Isaiah Joe's performance, noting his confidence and consistency.
Isaiah Joe emphasized the importance of staying consistent and having confidence in himself.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander praised Joe's shooting ability and predicted his slump would end.
Jalen Williams highlighted Joe's hard work and dedication in the gym.
